title: Pan-fried soufflé with creamy mustard sauce

default: 3 free-range egg whites, whisked until stiff peaks form

steps: Place the cream and cheese into a saucepan and warm through without boiling.
Remove from the heat for a few minutes and then beat in the egg yolks.
Fold the egg whites and chives into the cheese mixture.
Rub a small ovenproof frying pan with butter and dust with the plain flour. Place spoonfuls of the cheese mixture onto the frying pan and place into the oven to bake for eight minutes.
For the sauce, place the white wine and cream, mustard and chives into a saucepan over a medium heat and bring to a simmer. Cook for two minutes and remove from the heat.
To serve, place the soufflé into the centre of the plate and drizzle the sauce around.
